sentences:
Jenő Rejtő ( born Jenő Reich 1905 , died 1943 ; pseudonyms : P. Howard , Gibson Lavery ) was a Hungarian journalist , pulp fiction writer and playwright who died as a forced labourer during World War II .
He was born in Budapest , Austria - Hungary , on March 29 , 1905 , and died in Evdakovo , Voronezh Oblast , Soviet Union ( then under Axis occupation ) on January 1 , 1943 .
Despite the " pulp " nature of his writings , he is not only widely read in Hungary , but is also much appreciated by literary critics .
It is a prevalent opinion that he lifted the genre to the level of serious art , and his works will long outlive him .
